subject: Re: [junit] Validating xml
msgSnippet: ... XMLUnit. You ll also want to get to know the XPath API. -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
messageBody:
moe_morten wrote:

> I want to test that I get a valid result from a webservice call. I
> guess this involves validating the xml? Any tips on a good way to do
> this?

XMLUnit. You'll also want to get to know the XPath API.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
